name: Third Front: WWII
description: Are you ready to rewrite history and take on the role of ruler of the nation? Show your knowledge of tactics and strategy, become the commander-in-chief of a huge army! Lead the troops of one of the three nations - the USSR, Germany and the Allies - and pave your way for each of them!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2)+ Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card Storage: 275 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP (SP2)+ Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX® 9 Compatible Graphics Card Storage: 290 MB available space
